entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 31. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 37 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
